lead_paragraph: The North Dakota Farmers Union pushed to overturn the so-called ham-and-cheese law, which the legislature passed last year to exempt pork and dairy operations from a Depression-era ban.

headline.print_headline: N. Dakota Law on Farms Fails
headline.main: North Dakota Voters Reject Move to Ease Ban on Corporate Farming

snippet: The North Dakota Farmers Union pushed to overturn the so-called ham-and-cheese law, which the legislature passed last year to exempt pork and dairy operations from a Depression-era ban.
